heading: Welcome!
text: Takahiro Yoshida (吉田 崇紘) Project Assistant Professor Department Urban Engineering, School Engineering, University Tokyo, Japan. received Ph.D. degree Policy Planning Sciences University Tsukuba, 2018. research interests include: geographical information sciences (GIS GISc), remote sensing, spatial econometrics, spatial statistics, compositional data analysis, urban big data analysis.

heading: Education
text:
Ph.D. Policy Planning Sciences, University Tsukuba, March 2018. 
[Dissertation title] Methodological developments socio-economic applications compositional data analysis geographical data.M.Sc. Engineering, University Tsukuba, March 2015.B.Sc. Policy Planning Sciences, University Tsukuba, March 2013.

heading: Work experience
text:
April 2021 – present 
Project Assistant Professor, Department Urban Engineering, School Engineering, University Tokyo, Japan.April 2018 – March 2021 
Research Associate, Center Global Environmental Research, National Institute Environmental Studies, Japan.April 2016 – March 2018 
Research Fellow (DC2), Japan Society Promotion Science, Japan.(Concurrent appointments)April 2021 – present 
Part-Time Lecturer, Graduate School System Design Management, Keio University, Japan.April 2021 – present 
Visiting Researcher, Earth System Division, National Institute Environmental Studies, Japan.April 2019 – present 
Part-Time Lecturer, Department International Economics, Faculty Economics, Toyo University, Japan.
